name: HomeStead 3
description:
HomeStead 3

HomeStead 3 is First-Person game based on Georgian mythology.

There are some of Georgian monsters for example Shavi Xeli, Bua, Ali and others...

Controls:

WASD movement, CTRL to crouch,  Space to jump, L to turn on flashlight, O to turn off flashlight.

DEV NOTES

This was a solo project made in almost 5 months.

Playthrough is about 20mins, but obviously this depends on you.

Minimum System Requirements:

CPU: Intel Pentium Processor G620

GPU: Nvidia Geforce GT-730 - Maybe run on lower GPU

RAM: 4GB

500MB Space On Hard Drive

Install Instructions : Simply Extract .zip to a location and/or folder of your choice and play HomeStead 3

First Update - 5.12.2021

Game Version: 1.0

If game will continue growing I will work on multiplayer and add some new gamemodes and chapters too...
